    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  UserManager.OnManyUsersFetchListener
      This interface represents an action to be taken when a User document is updated in the Firestore database.
      static interface  UserManager.OnUserFetchListener
      This interface represents an action to be taken when a User document is updated in the Firestore database.

        public UserManager(java.lang.String collection)

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • createNewUser

        public User createNewUser(java.lang.String id)
        Creates a new User in the system.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the User to create
        Returns:
        The User that was created.

        Note that this User object will not track changes to the User document. If you need to receive all database updates for the User, fetch the User using UserManager#addUserUpdateListener()

      • getCurrentUser

        public void getCurrentUser(UserManager.OnUserFetchListener listener)
        Gets the current User through a callback.
        Parameters:
        listener - the callback to be called when the User is retrieved

      • getUser

        public void getUser(java.lang.String userId,
                    UserManager.OnUserFetchListener listener)
        Gets a User through a callback
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the User to retrieve
        listener - the callback to be called when the User is fetched

      • addCurrentUserUpdateListener

        public void addCurrentUserUpdateListener(UserManager.OnUserFetchListener listener)
        Sets a callback that will be called every time the current User is updated in the database. 
         UserManager manager = new UserManager();
 manager.addCurrentUserUpdateListener(new UserManager.OnUserUpdateListener() {
     @Override
     public void onUserUpdate(User user) {
         // Do something with the User every time the database is updated
     }
 });
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be called when the User document is fetched

      • addUserUpdateListener

        public void addUserUpdateListener(java.lang.String userId,
                                  UserManager.OnUserFetchListener listener)
        Sets a callback to fetch a User 
         UserManager manager = new UserManager();
 manager.addUserUpdateListener(userId, new UserManager.OnUserUpdateListener() {
     @Override
     public void onUserUpdate(User user) {
         // Do something with the User every time the database is updated
     }
 });
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the User to be fetched
        listener - the listener to be called when the User document is fetched

      • addAllUserUpdateListener

        public void addAllUserUpdateListener(UserManager.OnManyUsersFetchListener listener)
        Sets a callback to fetch all Users 
         UserManager manager = new UserManager();
 manager.addAllUsersUpdateListener(new UserManager.OnAllUserUpdateListener() {
     @Override
     public void onALlUsersUpdate(User user) {
         // Do something with the User every time the database is updated
     }
 });
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be called when the list of Users is fetched
